Name: Chocolate, Rum & Raisin
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
2.5 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of raisin & nut chocolate.
Garnish with raisin & nut chocolate balanced across rim.
Review: This cocktail delivers pretty much what it says on the tin – chocolate, rum and raisin. Best enjoyed after dinner with deluxe similarly flavoured chocolate.
History: Created by yours truly in April 2017 at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Chocolate, Rum & Raisin contains 251 calories
